document_api_meta.title: Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status List
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API offers the ability to get the product of the campaign fulfillment status for creators who added partner campaign products to their showcase. For details of a specified product involved in an affiliated campaign, use Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status Info gateway.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The partner access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 3. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3978f4c20311b8b555) to get partner access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The number of results to be returned per page. Valid range: 1-50.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The total count of products included in the specified campaign.

response_param.name: ^campaign_product_statistics
response_param.desc: A list of objects representing campaign product statistics.

response_param.name: ^^data_update_time
response_param.desc: The time at which the product data was last updated, in Unix epoch format.

response_param.name: ^^creator_sales_num
response_param.desc: The number of products sold in the campaign.

response_param.name: ^^collaborated_creators_num
response_param.desc: The total number of creators associated with the campaign.

response_param.name: ^^promoted_creator_num
response_param.desc: The number of the creators involved in the campaign.

response_param.name: ^^sample_requested_creator_num
response_param.desc: The total number of samples requested by all creators associated with the campaign.

response_param.name: ^^campaign_product_detail
response_param.desc: An object representing the details for the product associated with the campaign.

response_param.name: ^^^product_id
response_param.desc: The product identifier.

response_param.name: ^^^product_status
response_param.desc:
The product status. This is an enumerated type with values:
-  PRODUCT_UNSPECIFIED
-  PRODUCT_PENDING
-  PRODUCT_APPROVED
-  PRODUCT_REJECTED
-  PRODUCT_PENDING_CLOSED
-  PRODUCT_CLOSED

response_param.name: ^^^product_name
response_param.example: summer underwear soft dress summer underwear-001
response_param.desc: The product name.

response_param.name: ^^^product_stock_count
response_param.desc: The total number of products in stock.

response_param.name: ^^^total_commission_percent
response_param.desc: The commission rate of the partner plan. It is the sum of the `creator_commission_rate` and `partner_commission_rate`. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.

response_param.name: ^^^creator_commission_percent
response_param.desc: The commission rate for the creator in the partner plan. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.

response_param.name: ^^^partner_commission_percent
response_param.desc: The commission rate for the partner in the partner plan. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.

response_param.name: ^^^plan_commission_percent
response_param.desc: The commission rate for open collaboration. The value is in hundredths of a percent. For example, a value of 1000 means 10.00%.

response_param.name: ^^^product_price
response_param.desc: The product price.

response_param.name: ^^^^min_price
response_param.desc: The minimum offered price of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^max_price
response_param.desc: The maximum offered price of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code for the maximum and minimum offered price for the product.

response_param.name: ^^^product_thumbnail
response_param.desc: An object representing the product thumbnail.

response_param.name: ^^^^uri
response_param.desc: The base URI of the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^url_list
response_param.desc: A list of URLs for each image associated with the product.

response_param.name: ^^^indicator_data
response_param.desc: Key performance indicators for the product.

response_param.name: ^^^^paid_order_num
response_param.desc: The total number of paid orders. `paid_order_num` = `actual_order_num` + {number of paid but returned orders}

response_param.name: ^^^^actual_order_num
response_param.desc: The actual number of paid orders.

response_param.name: ^^^^estimated_amount
response_param.desc: The total payment amount corresponding to `paid_order_num`.

response_param.name: ^^^^actual_amount
response_param.desc: GMV, the total payment amount corresponding to `actual_order_num`.

response_param.name: ^^^^estimated_partner_commission
response_param.desc: The partner commission amount corresponding to paid_order_num.

response_param.name: ^^^^actual_partner_commission
response_param.desc: The partner commission amount corresponding to actual_order_num.

response_param.name: ^^^^creator_sales_num
response_param.desc: The number of creators credited with at least one product sale.

response_param.name: ^^^^collaborated_creators_num
response_param.desc: The total number of creators collaborating on the campaign.

response_param.name: ^^^^promoted_creator_num
response_param.desc: The number of creators involved in the partner plan.

response_param.name: ^^^^sample_requested_creator_num
response_param.desc: The total number of creators that applied for a sample.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: next page query token

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including view campaign list and details and campaign product list and details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including your contact information, campaign list and details, and campaign product list and details.

request_path_param.name: campaign_id
request_path_param.desc: the unique id of a campaign
